casebody.data:
Raleigh Goldridge ERVIN v. UNITED STATES of America. No. 6638. United States Court of Appeals Tenth Circuit. Jan. 24, 1961. Carroll Samara, Oklahoma City, Okl., for appellant. Paul W. Cress, U. S. Atty., and Jack R. Parr, Asst. U. S. Atty., Oklahoma City, Okl., for appellee.

Before BREITENSTEIN, Circuit Judge, and ARRAJ, District Judge.

PER CURIAM.

Appeal dismissed January 24, 1961, on motion of appellant.
